import './App.css';
import React, {
  useState,
  useEffect
} from 'react';



function App() {
  const [foodInfo, setFoodInfo] = useState([]);
  const [data, setData] = useState([]);

  useEffect(() => {
    // const url = "https://gist.githubusercontent.com/sharkyze/71efb42a5ee58c7a892bd0423f125802/raw/08655067e3bb69dc1c8cde68edc7f901c00b9205/restaurant-menu.json";
    const url = "https://foodbukka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/menu";
    fetch(url)
      .then(response => response.json())
      .then(info => setFoodInfo(info.Result))
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    setData(foodInfo);
  }, []);

  // console.log("data",foodInfo[0].images[0])
  // console.log("data",foodInfo[0].description)
  return ( <
    div className = "App" >

    <
    h1 >
    Restaurant Menu <
    br / >

    <
    /h1>

    <
    nav className = "NavMenu" >
    <
    ul >
    <
    li > < /li> <
    li > Breakfast < /li> <
    li > Lunch < /li> <
    li > Shakes < /li> <
    /ul> <
    /nav> <
    div className = "Container" >
    <
    div className = "Card" >
    <
    div className = "Picture" > < img src = {
      foodInfo[0].images[0]
    }
    alt = "" / > < /div> <
    div className = "TextBlock" >
    <
    div className = "NamePrice" >
    <
    h3 > Menu name < /h3> <
    p className = "Price" > price€ < /p> <
    /div> <
    p className = "MenuDescription" > {
      foodInfo[0].description
    } < /p> <
    /div> <
    /div> <
    div className = "Card" >
    <
    div className = "Picture" > < img src = {
      foodInfo[0].images[0]
    }
    alt = "" / > Picture < /div> <
    div className = "TextBlock" >
    <
    div className = "NamePrice" >
    <
    h3 > Menu name < /h3> <
    p className = "Price" > price€ < /p> <
    /div>

    <
    p className = "MenuDescription" > {
      foodInfo[0].description
    } < /p> <
    /div> <
    /div> <
    div className = "Card" >
    <
    div className = "Picture" > < img src = {
      foodInfo[0].images[0]
    }
    alt = "" / > Picture < /div> <
    div className = "TextBlock" >
    <
    div className = "NamePrice" >
    <
    h3 > Menu name < /h3> <
    p className = "Price" > price€ < /p> <
    /div>

    <
    p className = "MenuDescription" > menu aciklamasi < /p> <
    /div> <
    /div> <
    div className = "Card" >
    <
    div className = "Picture" > < img src = {
      foodInfo[0].images[0]
    }
    alt = "" / > Picture < /div> <
    div className = "TextBlock" >
    <
    div className = "NamePrice" >
    <
    h3 > Menu name < /h3> <
    p className = "Price" > price€ < /p> <
    /div>

    <
    p className = "MenuDescription" > menu aciklamasi < /p> <
    /div> <
    /div>

    <
    /div>


    <
    /div>
  );
}

export default App;
